entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
